tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: This locality is not very heavily populated. The roads are well done and the crossover from one side of the road to the other  between building societies located across the multi barreled roads requires U-turns after travelling long distances,and because it is not a densely populated area get away driving on the wrong side sometimes, but no one seems overly concerned about that just yet because there ample space for everyone to move aboutwith ease despite this, The area around sector 78 is connecteb by a metro line, and  the Metro station is with easy reach of most building societies there. The residents have access to facilities  such Atms, Banks, a Hospital and a reputed school within very short distances, eg:ICICC Bank atm, one of the nearest landmarks is located within a  distance of 0.6 km. There are only frequent power cuts.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: in the locality in night there is the not much safe for girls th late night. There is also parking issues, In this area sometimes the traffic becomes become more and the people stuck in traffic for more minutes. There is not too much police petrolling, There is also water scarcity in these locality, water scarcity is a common problem. There are not street lights are there.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
Sector 78 Noida is one of the high tech and very clean locality in comparison to the other localities.
Very convenient place for the workers,as it is located near to the yamuna express way and Greater noida expressway.
Plenty of housing available from low rate to high rate, grocery shops , malls , hospitals facilities are near the locality.
Lots of park are available where you can spend your time with your family or friends. Water reliability and electricity connection are also well maintained in the locality.
Overall it is a good and peaceful place to live.
Too much traffic and congestion and street lights are also not there.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review:
Power cut outs  is the major issue sometimes in the locality .
If you any crime happens against you , the police station is far away from the locality.
water scarcity is also the problem sometime in the society.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Noida Sector 78 is a convenient place for IT workers, has excellent connectivity, and is also close to many business centers. Well-developed locality with reliable electricity and water supplies. Even at night, Sector 78 is almost safe. It has Wide roads, shopping malls, hospitals etc. I really enjoyed the vibrant environment when I was living there.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Even though the connectivity is good, its limited. You can expect some noise and air pollution in some areas. Traffic congestion is there. and in monsoon season, congestion increases more and more. Also, the cost of living will be slightly higher in this vibrant environment.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: I am living here for last 6 years. I am so happy with this place. The area where I live is well connected. A metro stations nearby and a bus stop in 1 minute walking distance. I feel very secure here because of very near police station and city hospital. A city center is also present. I am living here very happily with my family.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The only thing that disappoint me is that there is no parks and playgrounds nearby. The environment is also much polluted. Facing daily traffic jam. And frequent power cut is also and issue.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
1. Sector 78 is located close to major arterial roads such as the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway and Yamuna Expressway.
2. The locality has good social infrastructure with schools, hospitals and shopping centers.
3. Sector 78 has several green areas making it great place to live for those who value natural surroundings.
4. There are plenty of housing options available in Sector 78 ranging from affordable apartments to luxury villas, catering to different budgets and preferences.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review:
1. Like most areas in Noida, traffic congestion can be a problem during peak hours.
2. Water scarcity is a common issue faced by residents in Sector 78.
3. The locality is closed to a few industrial areas , which may lead to noise pollution at times.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
This area is one of the commercial and high-tech areas of Noida. This is very clean area. Roads are 
well-maintained. There are lots of park where people can feel fresh and children can play games.
Metro connectivity are nearby available. This area is safe and Police patrolling frequently. There are no Electricity power cuts.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Dislikes about this locality  are too much traffic jams due to too much no of vehicles. Air Pollution can be also a factor for dislike, you have to wear masks in festivals seasons due to low quality air and air pollution. This area is safe but if you are a girl then you have to little aware in mid nights when you are outside. Cab drivers are looted and charged too much money for short distance when they know you are new city.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: I think societies situated in a manstream area of Noida transport service is good women security and child security is very good you can take a metro and bus and cab all the services available on there thank you.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: My concern about locality is the power cut and park for children is not available near.not ample space for children. And also there are some factories which is also spred pollution

pointers.title: Sector-78 Noida is an upscale housing hub dominated by 3 BHK residential apartments in the premium budget segment
Nearest metro stations are Sector-76 and Sector-101 on Noida Metro's Aqua Line, connecting to Greater Noida
Sector-78 Noida offers many high street commercial shops and restaurants within its periphery
About 10 km from prime commercial hubs located in Sector-62, Sector-63 and Sector-81 via Vishwakarma Road
Competitive rentals and quick access to the city's leading employment hubs propel rental demand in Sector-78 Noida
Local autos, feeder buses and e-rickshaws are available in this sector, making the commute easier
Popular developers in Sector-78 Noida are Mahagun Group, Antriksh Group, Nimbus and IITL Group & Sikka Group
Key highways, such as Noida-Greater Noida Expressway and FNG Expressway, are located 5-7 km from Sector-78 Noida
A slew of shopping malls, such as Logix City Center, Shopper's Mall, DLF The Mall of India and TGIP, fall within 10 km
Apart from the shopping malls, local markets, such as Atta Market and Brahmaputra Market, are 10 km away
The Manthan, Broadways International & Delhi Public School are some of the schools around Sector-78 Noida
Sector-78 is only 5-6 km from Shivalik Hospital, Neo Hospital and Surbhi Hospital
About 25 km from Hazrat Nizamuddin Railway Station via Vishwakarma Road
Indira Gandhi International Airport is about 36 km from Sector-78 Noida via Baba Banda Singh Bahadur
Improper waste disposal system is a major issue reported by the residents of Sector-78 Noida
Inadequate landscaping and ongoing construction work result in dust pollution in this sector
Residents of Sector-78 Noida raise concern over growing incidents of theft due to limited police patrolling
Several potholes and uneven roads make commutation more challenging in Sector-78 Noida
Heavy rains leave Vishwakarma Road waterlogged & increase travelling time towards the sector

templateData.insight: Nestled between Sector 79 Noida and Sector 103 Noida, Sector 78 Noida is one of the prominent localities in Noida. There are 504 properties available for sale in Sector 78 Noida that include mostly Apartments, Independent Houses and Builder Floors. Those willing to invest or buy a property here should know the following insights about Sector 78 Noida:

content.heading: How is connectivity in Sector 78 Noida?
content: If commuting is one of your major criteria for house hunting, Sector 78 Noida has a solution for all your housing needs. The locality lies in proximity to the Noida sector 101 metro station, which ensures the inter-connectivity of Sector 78 Noida with some of the popular hubs of Noida. Other nearby transit points in the neighborhood are Noida sector 76 metro station, Noida sector 81 metro station and Noida sector 50 metro station.
To read more about the connectivity of Sector 78 Noida, see here

content.heading: How is Sector 78 Noida neighborhood?
content: As far as social infrastructure is concerned, there are 1 educational institutes near Sector 78 Noida such as Government Post Graduate College Noida etc. For medical needs, some of the nearby hospitals are Ganpati Hospitaland Maternity Centre, Neo Multi Speciality Hospital, etc. For shopping purposes, some of the nearest markets are Sector 41 C-Block Market, Sector 50 Market and B-Block Market Sector 41.
To read more about the positives and negatives of Sector 78 Noida, see here.

content.heading: Price Trends in Sector 78 Noida
content: The current property rates in Sector 78 Noida hover around ₹ 5950 per sq ft. That means, the average property price for Apartments in Sector 78 Noida is ₹ 59.5 lakh.
There are around 4 Independent Houses for sale in Sector 78 Noida.The property prices vary between ₹ 40 to 723 lakh.
Sector 78 Noida also has 2 Builder Floors for sale and the prices are in the range of ₹ 35 to 70 lakh for sizes ranging between 1000 to 3000 sq ft.
Property prices in Sector 78 Noida have changed -0.8% since the past year.

faqs.answer: Sector 78 Noida property prices have changed -0.8% in 1 year & +25.3% in last 5 years. Notably, there is a scope for a price rise in the future as a lot of infra development is planned here.

About project

Sikka karmic greens is an ideal place for you if you are looking for some peace and quite as it is spread over several acres of vast space and beautiful landscape. The compound is surrounded by tall trees, scrubs and lush greenery which would ensure you a pollution free living. You can breath fresh air here and be at peace while exploring the beautiful scenic views and serenity. The apartments are beautifully and elegantly designed that offers the finest and best of luxuries. Sikka karmic greens is a perfect blend of conventions and luxuries so that you enjoy beautiful moments with your loved ones.

More about this property

Property for sale in sector 78, noida. This project, that is, sikka karmic greens is a well designed project by sikka group. It is offering ready to move units. If you are looking at apartment, you should check out sikka karmic greens. Set in an expanse of 4.94 acres , the property offers a remarkable lifestyle. Available configurations include 1 bhk, 2 bhk, 3 bhk. As per the area plan, units are in the size range of 316.0 - 1194.0 sq.Ft.. Sikka karmic greens was launched in june 2011. Project possession is slated for mar, 2018. There are 6 buildings in this project. Total number of flats at sikka karmic greens is 844. Sikka karmic greens is located in plot no. 1c, sector 78, noida. There are 844 units in this residential project.

Come home to sikka karmic greens. It offers multiple facilities such as gymnasium, ro water system, power backup. For families with kids, there is children's play area, nearby apart from swimming pool. If you are passionate about sports, you will enjoy the facilities such as tennis court, basketball court, badminton court, cycling & jogging track, golf course. You will also get access to atm, restaurants/ cafeterias, internet / wi-Fi, conference room, provisions in the project. It is an earthquake resistant structure. It is a gated community. These amenities make this property totally aspirational.

Major banks such as punjab national bank , hdfc, lic housing finance have approved financing for sikka karmic greens.

Sikka karmic greens has all approvals in place as mandated by the state regulatory authority. Rera id of this project is upreraprj4452.

Sikka group is a renowned name in the real estate space. Founded in 1990, the company has developed as many as 20 projects.

Social infrastructure like banks, schools and parks surround sector 78 area. It is also very well-Connected to various parts of the city by public transport network.

Project details

Sikka karmic greens comprises of entirely 672 well-Ventilated units across 6 towers . The magnificently beautiful and colorful surroundings along with the lush greenery will soothe your eyes as well as soul. The top-Quality residential flats come coupled with some of the finest amenities to make living memorable. Some of the top features of sikka karmic greens include security, reserved parking, power backup, club house, swimming pool, etc.

Highpoints

Sikka karmic greens as well offers an excellent location advantage of being close to the proposed metro corridor, golf course and a modern sports stadium which are right opposite to sector 78. It is only 0.5km from the developed sector-50 and 10 minutes away from the fortis hospital, dnd flyover, nh-24 and sector 18.What's more, at sikka karmic greens you are never far from schools, offices, malls and entertainment hubs.

The project offers plenty of benefits that include prime location, comfortable and lavish lifestyle, great amenities, healthy surroundings and high return. Home-Seekers can also go through the reviews in order to make a better choice.



About sikka karmic greens

Sikka karmic greens is strategically located in sector 78 in the city of noida and is a well-Planned project. Enjoy a niche living experience in this complex with units available from rs. 36. 0 lac - 1. 10 cr. The project is spread over a wide area of 5 acre. The entire project consists of over 844 residential units.

The carefully laid out units of this residential complex are sure to mesmerize most buyers. The exquisite property offering spacious units is ready to move. The units offered are flat, which have been developed to provide complete satisfaction. The spacious and well-Ventilated property units vary in size from 1 bhk flat (585. 0 sq. Ft. - 585. 0 sq. Ft. ), 2 bhk flat (930. 0 sq. Ft. - 1210. 0 sq. Ft. ), 3 bhk flat (1510. 0 sq. Ft. - 2100. 0 sq. Ft. ). Smartly planned, the complex has a total of 6 towers. 01 june 2011 is the project's launch date. The possession date of this beautifully designed project is 01 march 2018.

The commencement certificate of sikka karmic greens has been granted. And the occupancy certificate granted too. Sikka karmic greens project is an offering from the well-Established developer sikka group. Available with all facilities and amenities including power back up, conference room, jogging and strolling track, flower gardens, indoor games room, indoor squash & badminton courts, kids club, kids play area, meditation area, cycling & jogging track, sikka karmic greens is an ideal option to enjoy a contemporary lifestyle. The site's complete address is sector 78, noida, uttar pradesh 201305. The project's pin code is 201306. Enjoy the luxury of living with all modern conveniences in sikka karmic greens.

Sikka karmic greens floor plan

Highpoints
